attributes.action: return the davies family children that were kidnapped in mallorca
attributes.additional_details:
British children kidnapped in Mallorca
Our position is this;
•	We demand our children returned to our care immediately.
•	We did not consent to our children being placed in foster care.
•	Our children were kidnapped based on fraudulent information.
•	We demand that the perpetrators of crimes against our family be brought to justice.
•	We demand that you provide all files kept by Social Services to us immediately.
•	We demand that any future correspondence with us be in the English language as required by law.
